items.label: prop-h-theorem
items.title: H-Theorem for Geometric Gas
items.content:
568: :label: prop-h-theorem
569: 
570: Let $H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}})$ denote the relative entropy (Kullback-Leibler divergence) of the swarm distribution $f_t$ to the QSD. Then:
571: 
572: $$
573: \frac{d}{dt} H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \le -\kappa_{\text{total}} H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}})
574: 
575: $$
576: 
577: where $\kappa_{\text{total}} > 0$ is the exponential convergence rate from `08_emergent_geometry.md`.
items.raw_directive:
565: :::
566: 
567: :::{prf:proposition} H-Theorem for Geometric Gas
568: :label: prop-h-theorem
569: 
570: Let $H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}})$ denote the relative entropy (Kullback-Leibler divergence) of the swarm distribution $f_t$ to the QSD. Then:
571: 
572: $$
573: \frac{d}{dt} H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}}) \le -\kappa_{\text{total}} H(f_t | \pi_{\text{QSD}})
574: 
575: $$
576: 
577: where $\kappa_{\text{total}} > 0$ is the exponential convergence rate from `08_emergent_geometry.md`.
